In a response to Nicki Minajâ€™s recent song with Gucci Mane, â€œMake Love,â€ Remy Ma has now taken a big swing at her with the release of her diss track â€œShether.â€ The almost 7 minute track, goes in hard and she is not holding back with lines such as â€œFâ€“k Nicki Minaj.â€
Remy Ma took a big swing at Nicki Minaj on Saturday (Feb. 24), dropping a scathing diss track in what appears to be in response to Minajâ€™s recent song with Gucci Mane, â€œMake Love.â€ The cover art further underlines that with Minajâ€™s pink-haired Barbie doll cut into bloody pieces. Listen to the track now here below.

â€œYou stole that line about bitches being your sons/ How you take my â€™09 jail tweet and run Talkinâ€™ â€˜bout bringing knives to a fight with guns/ When the only shot you ever took was in your buns.â€
